TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit RemoteConference extends Java.Lang.Object
Public NotInheritable Class RemoteConference Inherits Object
public ref class RemoteConference sealed : Java::Lang::Object

Docs.summary: A conference provided to a ConnectionService by another ConnectionService through ConnectionService#conferenceRemoteConnections.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ConferenceableConnections As IList(Of RemoteConnection)

Docs.summary: Returns a list of independent connections that can me merged with this conference.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ConnectionCapabilities As ConnectionCapability
public: property Android::Telecom::ConnectionCapability ConnectionCapabilities { Android::Telecom::ConnectionCapability get(); };

Docs.summary: Returns the capabilities of the conference.
Docs.value: A bitmask of the capabilities of the conference call.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ConnectionProperties As ConnectionProperties
public: property Android::Telecom::ConnectionProperties ConnectionProperties { Android::Telecom::ConnectionProperties get(); };

Docs.summary: Returns the properties of the conference.
Docs.value: A bitmask of the properties of the conference call.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Connections As IList(Of RemoteConnection)

Docs.summary: Returns the list of RemoteConnections contained in this conference.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Disconnect() cil managed

Docs.summary: Disconnects the conference call as well as the child RemoteConnections.
